item.title: About - Reza Safari
item.description: Reza has experience using data driven methodologies to drive insight for product decisions through consulting methodologies. With a background in Electrical Engineering he aims to use design thinking and lean startup methodologies to deliver further value to businesses. Reza has a skill in contributing to strategy, operation and product decisions across business units. This involves optimising processes with a constant drive for results, and looking to be able to solve greater challenges.

item.title: Interesting Reads - August
item.description: Wired Article on Marcus Hutchins - Pareto Efficiency Mario Kart - Python 2019 Dev Survey

item.title: T-Shaped Data Professional or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Specialist
item.description: Data Science is one of the few interdisciplinary fields which can always use specialists with a broad general knowledge, and a specialization that brings a unique flavor to the formula. Here’s why we should aspire to be T-Shaped professionals
